name: SmartAIPress
author: SmartAIPress

sections.description:
Unleash the Power of AI to Revolutionize Your Content Creation. Effortlessly generate high-quality articles, blog posts, and web content with our intelligent AI-driven plugin. Say goodbye to writer’s block and hello to a world of creativity and efficiency.

AI Generated Images

SmartAIPress Gallery

FEATURES

  • Generate articles
  • Generate articles featured images
  • Generate WooCommerce products descriptions
  • Generate WooCommerce product feature images
  • Images SEO optimization (PRO)
  • Images compression (PRO)
  • Images editing (PRO)
  • Custom prompts (PRO)
  • Generate DALL*E HD images (PRO)

VIDEO TUTORIAL
sections.installation:
The installation of the SmartAIPress plugin is straight forward and very easy.
You can install it from the WordPress admin dashboard plugins page,
or you can manually install it by downloading the smartaipress.zip file from wp.org and follow next procedure:

  1. Unzip the smartaipress.zip file.
  2. Upload smartaipress folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How i can obtain OpenAI API Key?

To initiate the process, kindly establish a new account via the OpenAI API sign-up page. Subsequently, proceed to access the OpenAI API keys section to continue with the requisite steps.
